full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYAMS BSKOR GYI RNAM BZHAG SKAL BZANG MIG GI BDUD RTZI'I DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES BYAMS BSKOR GYI RNAM BZHAG GO RIM SGRIGS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB MA KU SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG RIN CHEN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, RANG BZHIN RGYUD 'JAM ZHING DAD PA SOGS DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN GYIS MDZES PA NO K'ON T'A RAS KYANG 'TSAMS SBYAR BA'I RKYEN GYIS, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BYAMS BSKOR GYI BKOD PA DANG 'DON CHA SOGS, ^YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE GONG MA CHEN POS BKOD PA GNANG BA'I MTHONG RGYUD LA GZHI BYAS, MDO RTZA'I RGYA CHER 'GREL DANG, DAM PA GZHAN GYI GSUNG LAS KYANG KHA BSKANG ZUR BRGYAN GYI LUGS SU BGYIS TE SMRAS PAS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
